welcome.title: Welcome to the RungeCoin wallet!
welcome.welcomeText:
With this wallet you can store your **ethers** anonymously and securely.
**The decentralized world awaits you!**
welcome.createWalletButton: I want to create a new wallet

startGuide.title: Create a new wallet
startGuide.guide1:
To access a wallet the **secret words** are necessary, these act as **key**.
Once you have obtained your words, we will ask you for a password so that you can open your wallet in a more simple.
startGuide.guide2:
**We don't store your secret words**

Keep them in a safe place. You don't lose them or share them with anyone.
startGuide.guide3:
Enjoy your new wallet!

In case you lose access to it, it can be recovered using the **secret words**.

createSeedPhrase.title: Secret recovery words
createSeedPhrase.warningMessage: If you lose these words, **you will lose access to your wallet**, it is recommended to keep them written on paper, or in some other physical medium **without internet access**.

inputs.passwordError:
Password must has 8 characters long.
At least 1 upper case.
At least 1 number.
Special character are not allowed
inputs.seedPhraseErrorLength: The number of secret words is incorrect.

validateAccess.title: Enter your password to access the wallet

inputs.passwordError: Wrong password, you have 4 attempts left.

receive.title: Receive cryptos
receive.qrMessage: Scan this QR to receive cryptos

send.title: Send cryptos
send.notFoundsForFeeNotification: You do not have funds to pay shipping fee
send.gasDescription: The **gas** is the toll that is used to carry out operations on the **blockchain**.

qr.title: Scan the QR code of the destination wallet
qr.message: Remember that the wallet must be from the **Ethereum** network, otherwise you may lose your funds
